connect20/auguria_sponsorship.name: connect20/Auguria_Sponsorship

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/auguria_sponsorship.description:
This module allows customers to earn fidelity and sponsorship points.
Customers can invit friends on your site and when their friends buy products, they earn sponsorship points. If a godchild sponsor a person, the sponsor will earn a percentage too.
When customers buy, they can win fidelity points. 
These points can then be exchanged against cash, discounts or gifts (not yet implemented).

connect20/auguria_sponsorship.description:

Customers can invit friends on your site and when their friends buy products, they earn sponsorship points. If a godchild sponsor a person, the sponsor will earn a percentage too.

When customers buy, they can win fidelity points. 

These points can then be exchanged against cash, discounts or gifts (not yet implemented).

connect20/auguria_sponsorship.name: connect20/Auguria_Sponsorship

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/auguria_sponsorship.description:
Add possibility to :
- Add fidelity points to the customer if customer subscribe to the newletter on registration
- Add fidelity points on first order payment
-Add sponso points on first godson order payment
